verses.verse: בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> [was] twenty וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֣ךְ <S%H4427><s%> [when] he began to reign אֲמַצְיָ֔הוּ <S%H558><s%> Amaziah וְעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וָתֵ֙שַׁע֙ <S%H8672><s%> and nine שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> And his mother's יְהוֹעַדָּ֖ן <S%H3086><s%> [was] Jehoaddan מִירוּשָׁלָֽיִם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD רַ֕ק <S%H7535><s%> but לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> not בְּלֵבָ֥ב <S%H3824><s%> heart שָׁלֵֽם׃ <S%H8003><s%> but not with a perfect

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after חָזְקָ֥ה <S%H2388><s%> was established הַמַּמְלָכָ֖ה <S%H4467><s%> Now it came to pass when the kingdom עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> and וַֽיַּהֲרֹג֙ <S%H2026><s%> to him that he slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבָדָ֔יו <S%H5650><s%> his servants הַמַּכִּ֖ים <S%H5221><s%> that had killed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> his father

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> not their children לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor הֵמִ֑ית <S%H4191><s%> But he slew כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for כַכָּת֣וּב <S%H3789><s%> but [did] as [it is] written בַּתּוֹרָ֡ה <S%H8451><s%> in the law בְּסֵ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book מֹשֶׁה֩ <S%H4872><s%> of Moses אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֨ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> where the LORD לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יָמ֨וּתוּ <S%H4191><s%> shall not die אָב֤וֹת <S%H1><s%> The fathers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for בָּנִים֙ <S%H1121><s%> for the children וּבָנִים֙ <S%H1121><s%> neither shall the children לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יָמ֣וּתוּ <S%H4191><s%> die עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for אָב֔וֹת <S%H1><s%> for the fathers כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> but אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> but every man בְּחֶטְא֖וֹ <S%H2399><s%> for his own sin יָמֽוּתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> shall die פ

וַיִּקְבֹּ֤ץ <S%H6908><s%> together אֲמַצְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H558><s%> Moreover Amaziah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וַיַּֽעֲמִידֵ֣ם <S%H5975><s%> and made לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> according to the houses אָב֗וֹת <S%H1><s%> of [their] fathers לְשָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> them captains הָאֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> over thousands וּלְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> and captains הַמֵּא֔וֹת <S%H3967><s%> over hundreds לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> throughout all Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin וַֽיִּפְקְדֵ֗ם <S%H6485><s%> and he numbered לְמִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> them from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and above וַיִּמְצָאֵ֗ם <S%H4672><s%> and found שְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> them three מֵא֨וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אֶ֤לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand בָּחוּר֙ <S%H970><s%> choice יוֹצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> [men able] to go forth צָבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> to war אֹחֵ֖ז <S%H270><s%> that could handle רֹ֥מַח <S%H7420><s%> spear וְצִנָּֽה׃ <S%H6793><s%> and shield

וַיִּשְׂכֹּ֣ר <S%H7936><s%> He hired מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> out of Israel מֵ֥אָה <S%H3967><s%> also an hundred אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand גִּבּ֥וֹר <S%H1368><s%> mighty חָ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> men of valour בְּמֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> for an hundred כִכַּר־ <S%H3603><s%> talents כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> of silver

וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God בָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> But there came אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> to him לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> to him saying הַמֶּ֕לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> O king אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> go עִמְּךָ֖ <S%H5973><s%> let צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> let not the army יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> else יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> [is] not with Israel כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> any בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> [to wit with] all the children אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> But אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if בֹּ֣א <S%H935><s%> But if thou wilt go אַתָּ֔ה <S%H859><s%> you עֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> do חֲזַ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> [it] be strong לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> for the battle יַכְשִֽׁילְךָ֤ <S%H3782><s%> shall make thee fall הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> God לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before אוֹיֵ֔ב <S%H341><s%> the enemy כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> hath כֹּ֛חַ <S%H3581><s%> power בֵּאלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> for God לַעְז֥וֹר <S%H5826><s%> to help וּלְהַכְשִֽׁיל׃ <S%H3782><s%> and to cast down

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲמַצְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H558><s%> And Amaziah לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God וּמַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> what לַּעֲשׂוֹת֙ <S%H6213><s%> But what shall we do לִמְאַ֣ת <S%H3967><s%> for the hundred הַכִּכָּ֔ר <S%H3603><s%> talents אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> which I have given לִגְד֣וּד <S%H1416><s%> to the army יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> answered אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to the man הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God יֵ֚שׁ <S%H3426><s%> is לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לָ֥תֶת <S%H5414><s%> able to give לְךָ֖ הַרְבֵּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> thee much more מִזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיַּבְדִּילֵ֣ם <S%H914><s%> separated אֲמַצְיָ֗הוּ <S%H558><s%> Then Amaziah לְהַגְּדוּד֙ <S%H1416><s%> them [to wit] the army אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> that was come אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> to him מֵֽאֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> to him out of Ephraim לָלֶ֖כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to go לִמְקוֹמָ֑ם <S%H4725><s%> home וַיִּ֨חַר <S%H2734><s%> kindled אַפָּ֤ם <S%H639><s%> wherefore their anger מְאֹד֙ <S%H3966><s%> was greatly בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> against Judah וַיָּשׁ֥וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> and they returned לִמְקוֹמָ֖ם <S%H4725><s%> home בָּחֳרִי־ <S%H2750><s%> in great אָֽף׃ <S%H639><s%> anger פ

וַאֲמַצְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H558><s%> And Amaziah הִתְחַזַּ֔ק <S%H2388><s%> strengthened וַיִּנְהַג֙ <S%H5090><s%> himself and led forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> along גֵּ֣יא <S%H1516><s%> to the valley הַמֶּ֑לַח <S%H4417><s%> of salt וַיַּ֥ךְ <S%H5221><s%> and smote אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children שֵׂעִ֖יר <S%H8165><s%> of Seir עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> ten אֲלָפִֽים׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand

וַעֲשֶׂ֨רֶת <S%H6235><s%> And [other] ten אֲלָפִ֜ים <S%H505><s%> thousand חַיִּ֗ים <S%H2416><s%> [left] alive שָׁבוּ֙ <S%H7617><s%> carry away captive בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> did the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיְבִיא֖וּם <S%H935><s%> and brought לְרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> them unto the top הַסָּ֑לַע <S%H5553><s%> of the rock וַיַּשְׁלִיכ֛וּם <S%H7993><s%> and cast them down מֵֽרֹאשׁ־ <S%H7218><s%> from the top הַסֶּ֖לַע <S%H5553><s%> of the rock וְכֻלָּ֥ם <S%H3605><s%> were all נִבְקָֽעוּ׃ <S%H1234><s%> that they all were broken in pieces ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> But the soldiers הַגְּד֗וּד <S%H1416><s%> of the army אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> sent הֵשִׁ֤יב <S%H7725><s%> sent back אֲמַצְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H558><s%> which Amaziah מִלֶּ֤כֶת <S%H1980><s%> along עִמּוֹ֙ <S%H5973><s%> with לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> with him to battle וַֽיִּפְשְׁטוּ֙ <S%H6584><s%> fell בְּעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> upon the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah מִשֹּׁמְר֖וֹן <S%H8111><s%> from Samaria וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בֵּ֣ית חוֹר֑וֹן <S%H1032><s%> even unto Bethhoron וַיַּכּ֤וּ <S%H5221><s%> and smote מֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> three אֲלָפִ֔ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וַיָּבֹ֖זּוּ <S%H962><s%> of them and took בִּזָּ֥ה <S%H961><s%> spoil רַבָּֽה׃ <S%H7227><s%> much ס

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came אַחֲרֵ֨י <S%H310><s%> Now it came to pass after ב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> was come אֲמַצְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H558><s%> that Amaziah מֵֽהַכּ֣וֹת <S%H5221><s%> from the slaughter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲדוֹמִ֔ים <S%H130><s%> of the Edomites וַיָּבֵ֗א <S%H935><s%> that he brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵי֙ <S%H430><s%> the gods בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children שֵׂעִ֔יר <S%H8165><s%> of Seir וַיַּֽעֲמִידֵ֥ם <S%H5975><s%> and set them up ל֖וֹ לֵאלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> [to be] his gods וְלִפְנֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H6440><s%> himself before יִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֖ה <S%H7812><s%> and bowed down וְלָהֶ֥ם יְקַטֵּֽר׃ <S%H6999><s%> them and burned incense

וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> Wherefore the anger יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בַּאֲמַצְיָ֑הוּ <S%H558><s%> against Amaziah וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> and he sent אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about נָבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> unto him a prophet וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> which said ל֗וֹ לָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why דָרַ֙שְׁתָּ֙ <S%H1875><s%> unto him Why hast thou sought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> after the gods הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not הִצִּ֥ילוּ <S%H5337><s%> which could not deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמָּ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> their own people מִיָּדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> able

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּדַבְּר֣וֹ <S%H1696><s%> And it came to pass as he talked אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> him וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> with him that [the king] said לוֹ֙ הַלְיוֹעֵ֤ץ <S%H3289><s%> counsel לַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's נְתַנּ֔וּךָ <S%H5414><s%> unto him Art thou made חֲדַל־ <S%H2308><s%> ? forbear לְךָ֖ לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why יַכּ֑וּךָ <S%H5221><s%> why shouldest thou be smitten וַיֶּחְדַּ֣ל <S%H2308><s%> forbare הַנָּבִ֗יא <S%H5030><s%> ?
